title: It May Be the Trial of the Year
itunes:title: It May Be the Trial of the Year
description:
Anne Coughlin, a professor at the University of Virginia Law School who specializes in feminist jurisprudence, discusses the August trial of Elizabeth Holmes, the founder of the defunct blood testing company Theranos, and possible defenses.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
